titleStmt.title: Apanthismata. memorials of worthy persons lights and ornaments of the Church of England, two new decads.
Memorials of worthy persons. Decades 1-2
titleStmt.author: Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. and L. Lichfield and are to be sold by S. Thomson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
Bound and filmed with Wing B802: Memorials of worthy persons (lights and ornaments of the Church of England.) the fourth decad. / by Cl. Barksdale. Oxford : Printed by A. and L. Lichfield, 1663.
